profile.description: I am a backend developer passionate about creating scalable and efficient solutions. With experience in technologies such as JAVA, C#, and Python, I am always focused on improving performance and software quality.

trainings.title: Trainings
trainings.second-training-description: Studying course on udemy.com focused on creating REST APIs, implementing security, error handling, etc.

projects.first-project-description:
Project developed with React + Vite.
This project is about a turn-based fighting game where each character has unique stats.
projects.second-project-description:
The project was developed to monitor the times students at the center go to the bathroom.
The API in Spring connects to a PostgreSQL database.
The frontend was built with Ionic + React + TypeScript.
I used JSPDF to export the records to PDF.
